name: Petscop
summary: Petscop is a fictional game featured in the YouTube web series of the same name. Presented as a "lost" and unfinished PS1 puzzle game from a company named Garalina, it is eventually revealed to have disturbing and personal ties to the series's narrator, Paul. There was speculation about whether or not Petscop was an actual game that was programmed, and whether or not such a game would be made available to fans after the end of the series. Ultimately, it was revealed that the world of Petscop was created via animation.
